input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Company 12-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 12-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Frasier Grande Tree'
  - Name='FRONTGate Christmas Cheer Pathway Trees Set of 2'
  - Name='Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Royal Majestic Douglas Fir Downswept Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. Pre-Lit ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Lavender Christmas Pine Tree w/ Flocked Branches'
  - Name='Glitzhome 6ft Pre-Lit Greenery Pine Cones and Red Berries Christmas Porch Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 3' Snowed Grand Teton Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 50 Clear Lights and 111 Bendable Branches'
  - Name='Puleo International 6.5 ft. Pre-Lit Slim Flocked Aspen Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7 ft. Feel Real Downswept Douglas Fir Hinged Tree with Clear Lights - Green'
  - Name='National Tree Company 6 ft. Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights'
  - Name='Costway 7 Foot Premium Snow Flocked Slim Artificial Christmas Fir Tree w/ Pine Cones'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 4' Northern Tip Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with 100 Clear LED Lights'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 6' South Carolina Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 450 Clear Lights and 1598 Bendable Branches'
  - Name='Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Flocked Aspen Noble Fir Christmas Tree w Branch Tips'
  - Name='Bulk - 6 Pack: 3Ft Pre-Lit Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree, Clear Lights By Puleo International in Green | 3 ft | Michaels'
  - Name='Glitzhome 7.5' Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Fir Christmas Tree with 400 Warm White Lights'
  - Name='Puleo International 7.5ft. Pre-Lit Linden Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Holiday Living 6.5-ft Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5-ft. ''Feel Real'' Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Classic Blue Spruce Traditional Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product type and use (pre-lit, artificial, full evergreen). Different tree species (Blue Spruce vs. Douglas Fir) and not the same brand, but function, silhouette, and construction are similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Frasier Grande Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar artificial pre-lit Christmas tree, just a different fir species and potentially different tip technology. Same core product type and brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: FRONTGate Christmas Cheer Pathway Trees Set of 2
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are pathway trees, likely smaller with a different intended use (outdoor/entry decor vs. main holiday tree). Different silhouette and display context.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 7.5 ft. Pre-Lit Royal Majestic Douglas Fir Downswept Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Direct competitor: very similar product type, species (Douglas Fir), silhouette (downswept), and size. Same pre-lit feature, just a different brand and naming.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Lavender Christmas Pine Tree w/ Flocked Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (pine not fir) and flocked, possibly for a more novelty look. Both are pre-lit Christmas trees but silhouette and use are slightly less aligned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 6ft Pre-Lit Greenery Pine Cones and Red Berries Christmas Porch Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar function (decorative Christmas tree), but added elements (pine cones, berries) and potential intention as a porch/outdoor tree make it less closely related.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 3' Snowed Grand Teton Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 50 Clear Lights and 111 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar product type but much smaller ('3'), different species and appearance (snowed), and fewer lights. Intended for smaller spaces.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6.5 ft. Pre-Lit Slim Flocked Aspen Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same core product (pre-lit artificial tree, similar height) but 'slim' silhouette and flocked (snowy) finish make it functionally and visually less similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7 ft. Feel Real Downswept Douglas Fir Hinged Tree with Clear Lights - Green
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Hyper-relevant: Extremely close in height and identical in function, features, species, brand, and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 6 ft. Downswept Douglas Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with Clear Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very close in size (6 ft. vs. 6.5 ft.), same silhouette and features, but 'Feel Real' and pre-lit specs not explicitly stated; potentially slightly less advanced.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Costway 7 Foot Premium Snow Flocked Slim Artificial Christmas Fir Tree w/ Pine Cones
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial fir tree, similar height, but 'slim' silhouette, snow flocking, and pine cones make it less relevant to standard full green fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 4' Northern Tip Pine Artificial Christmas Tree with 100 Clear LED Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Smaller size, pine not fir, but shares pre-lit, artificial, decorative role. Less relevant due to scale/species.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 6' South Carolina Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 450 Clear Lights and 1598 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Core similarities: pre-lit artificial fir, similar height, but a different species and potentially less premium construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Best Choice Products Pre-Lit Flocked Aspen Noble Fir Christmas Tree w Branch Tips
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar product (pre-lit artificial fir), but flocked appearance and different fir species.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Bulk - 6 Pack: 3Ft Pre-Lit Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree, Clear Lights By Puleo International in Green | 3 ft | Michaels
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Small size (3 ft), likely intended as accent decor or tabletop tree, not as a primary household tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 7.5' Pre-Lit Snow Flocked Fir Christmas Tree with 400 Warm White Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Good match in size, species (fir), silhouette, and construction, but flocked appearance deviates from reference product's real-green look.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 7.5ft. Pre-Lit Linden Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar in type, use, and size; different species (Linden Fir) and brand but closely related form/function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Holiday Living 6.5-ft Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very close in size and function, but flocked (snowy) look and unspecified fir/pine species make it somewhat less identical to the real-green Downswept Douglas Fir.
